name: Ugly Dot
description:
Warning ::

THIS GAME A GAME THAT IS ALMOST DONE BUT IS STILL DEVELOPING LEVELS NEAR FINISHED! ALSO MY 1st GAME
#MadeWithFusion
#MadeWithFusionJam (on GameJolt)

Controls ::
Shift - Jump
Arrow Keys - Move
S - Skip End Credits
Down Arrow Keys - Crouch

Notes ::
-If moving platforms are higher than suppose to be, then close out the window and re-open, also keep it windowed to reduce lag.
